name: Stranded (itch) (Dirkheim)
description:
Submitted in fulfillment of my midterms for Game Programming 1, Stranded is a collection game where the player is tasked with collecting all the supplies for the spaceship to continue exploring in space. 

Controls:
Space - Boost the ship forward
WASD - Move the ship
Q and E - Rotate the ship

BGM Credit: Everything is Going to Be Okay -  Mick Gordon
